concept.title: Cluster-wide diagnostics
concept.shortdesc: The Couchbase support team uses logs and other system diagnostics to analyze customer issues.

conbody.p: If you contact the Couchbase customer support, you might be asked to collect diagnostics from your cluster. Couchbase Server offers several methods that enable you to efficiently collect diagnostics for an entire cluster.
To collect diagnostic information, you can use either the Couchbase Web Console, CLI, or the REST API.
